mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( member_key, member_name, member_id, member_pwd, member_email ) VALUES ( member_seq.nextval, #{member_name}, #{member_id}, #{member_pwd}, #{member_email} )
mapper.select: select p.* from team_member mem, team, project p where member_key = #{member_key} and mem.team_key = team.team_key and team.project_key = p.project_key
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO invite_member ( invite_key, invited_member, invitee_email, joined ) VALUES ( invite_seq.nextval, #{member_key}, #{member_email}, '0' )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM invite_member ORDER BY invite_key desc
